name: Checkers 2 Players (Dama)
description:
The Checkers game is one of the classic board games that was part of many people's childhoods, also known as draughts, or dama.

Our game is designed to please our players and provide a pleasurable gaming experience.

FEATURES
• Application size has been optimized and reduced
• You can play Checkers 2 players mode
• No internet connection required
• 4 Board and pieces themes
• Simple and beautiful graphics
• Realistic sound effects
• Customizable rules
• Single and Multiplayer Checkers

SUPPORTED LANGUAGES
• English
• Portuguese
• Spanish

RULES
There are several strands regarding the game rules, you can choose each aspect of the rules. With our game, you can play the following variations:
• American Checkers (English Drafts)
• International
• Spanish
• Brazilian

Our game is free and is an excellent hobby to exercise your brain. If you like board games like dominoes or chess, you'll love playing Checkers.

We are constantly improving the game, any suggestion or comment leave us a review, which we will answer you.
